Reviews.Title: palm treo
Reviews.Author: George Harvey
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone because I wanted a phone that could sync with my calander and contacts without having to be on a data plan.  All other smart phones with Verizon required a plan. If you get this phone, I would also recomment that you buy Spb Mobile shell, which is a great interface.

Reviews.Title: Palm Treo 700WX
Reviews.Author: Kenneth A. Steele
Reviews.Content: Great phone! Bluetooth, WIFI slot, calendar, touch screen, camera, video recorder , GPS adapter, Microsoft Windows Mobile 6, Microsoft Office, Word, Excel, Power Point, Outlook, PDF reader.

Reviews.Title: Awesome....
Reviews.Author: Ann-Marie
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased the Palm Treo 700w....it is an awesome phone, I would recommend for anyone who wants a reliable, stylish phone that works.....everything works fine, and like I said, it's a stylish smart phone.....

Reviews.Title: Palm Treo 700w/wx Problem with texting
Reviews.Author: Linda W.W.
Reviews.Content: This WAS a great phone...I loved it until this last summer when it suddenly stopped receiving text messages from people with cells of other carriers.  After much time with Verizonwireless support, I was finally told that the problem was that texts from VZW customers to phones of other carriers are routed through Syniverse, a 3rd-party company which re-encodes the message. Syniverse made recent changes in the encoding technique that have made it impossible for VZW Treo 700w/wx to receive texts from other carriers besides Verizon. Verizon tech says the problem is in the Treo 700w and 700wx software. Verizon is not going to support a fix for the problem....so anyone now using a Treo 700w/wx will not be able to receive texts from cells with other phone carriers.

Reviews.Title: lost verizon
Reviews.Author: Ronald W. Johnson "Old Curiosity Shopper"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone last month;  as far as I could tell it LOOKED as good as new (it was labeled 'refurbished'); but before I could activate it, I saw two problems:  it didn't seem to be able to hold a charge overnight, and where I'm located Verizon just doesn't seem able to maintain a connection.  I called the seller, who said I needed a new battery, but they did not provide one;  I bought a new extra-strength battery from Amazon, and that seemed to solve the charge problem.  BUT talking with a Verizon representative, I was told my problem was that I'm calling from inside a building;  that didn't satisfy me for a few reasons:  I used to have a Palm Treo 680 + AT&T;, which I always used within a (different) building, and didn't have connectivity problems, and I've asked other cellphone users who do not have Verizon and can stand right next to me & use their phones without problems.  Also, I am located here for the forseeable future (living in a home for the physically disabled), so relocating is not a reasonable option;  and I do have to go to a hospital occasinally, and really need to have a smartphone I can rely on at those times.  I REALLY LIKE THIS PHONE, BUT I wish I could have it changed to use on another server, probably AT&T.;  IS THAT POSSIBLE?

Reviews.Title: Palm Treo 700wx
Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. I had it a few years ago and decided o go back to another one. The Blackberrys are to expensive and I love the Microsoft base for this phone. It is very helpful with the excel and powerpoint.

Reviews.Title: Did not work
Reviews.Author: Melissa Wheeler
Reviews.Content: It didn't work. When calling someone, the other person couldn't hear you. You could hear them. You could make calls, but the person couldn't here you

Reviews.Title: This model is great!
Reviews.Author: Wendy Woo "2beijing"
Reviews.Content: I have owned many phones and had stayed with Palm until the 750 model came out. I bought a few of these older models - I had one for 7 years!!! Travel a lot internationally dropped it, threw it a few times! It worked great!

Reviews.Title: could not activate phone
Reviews.Author: joe stampley
Reviews.Content: I sent the treo 700 back to sender.  I sent it abour aweek  a go.  Have not  recieved the phone at this time.  Can you  follow up on this item.  Please give me some feed back.

Reviews.Title: wrong product
Reviews.Author: Joshua L. Gadson
Reviews.Content: paid for a palm treo 700wx. received a palm treo 700p. very very unhappy with the phone i received. nuff said
